name: Frogo Makes You Cry
description:
Finish your homework while Frogo is trying to stop you! Laugh at memes and my poor game design choices!

SoundEffects by WaveplaySFX, simoneyoh3998s, yummie, WhaTThes and OwlStorm

Enjoy my typos, such as "Assignet"
